person.persName: George M. Pettit (Powell County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Kentucky native. Son of Asda T. Pettit and Sarah A. Pettit. Married to Priscilla W. Wills Pettit in Powell County, Kentucky, on September 20, 1858. Father of Mary T. Pettit, William Pettit, and Lura Pettit. Resident of Montogmery County, in 1850. Merchant in Powell County in 1860. Postmaster in Powell County from 1860 to 1864.
